mapper.select: select r.id, r.role_name, r.role_code, p.position_name, r.sort, r.role_status, r.role_desc, s1.full_name as createdName, r.create_time, s2.full_name as updatedName, r.update_time, r.sale_area, r.position_id from ope_sys_role r left join ope_sys_staff s1 on r.created_by = s1.id left join ope_sys_staff s2 on r.updated_by = s2.id left join ope_sys_position p on r.position_id = p.id where r.dr = 0 and r.id = #{roleId}
select count(*) from ope_sys_role r right JOIN ope_sys_position p on r.position_id = p.id where r.dr = 0 and p.dr = 0

select r.id, r.role_code, r.role_name, r.sort, p.position_name, r.role_status, r.create_time, r.sale_area, r.position_id from ope_sys_role r left join ope_sys_position p on r.position_id = p.id where r.dr = 0
order by r.sort,r.create_time desc limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}
select * from ope_sys_staff staff left join ope_sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = staff.id where staff.dr = 0 and ur.role_id = #{roleId} and staff.status = 1
